input.sentences: while on vacation | we went to a beautiful church .
once inside | the foyer had these wonderful arches .
this church was set into a generous countryside .
sunset from the church window was the perfect sight to end our day .
output.sentences: While on vacation I visited a beautiful church.
The inside foyer had wonderful architectural design.
The sconces were intricate and incredible to see.
I then set out to see the countryside and meet the generous townsfolk who lived there.
At the end of the day, I witnessed a beautiful sight which was the sunset from my car window.
